name: ADAPT (itch) (aliceroni)
description:
Move: Arrow Keys 

Jump: Z

Attack:  X

Play as a creature that rapidly adapts to their environment through consumption. The player must escape the laboratory in which it was created by consuming other creatures loose in the lab. These creatures grant the player new abilities and stats that will help the player escape. Progresses through floors, starting on the lowest level, gradually encountering stronger and stronger creatures and threats along the way. Discover different combinations of evolutions and cosmetics to personalize your creature and playstyle. Use your evolved abilities to discover secrets in places others can't reach.
